snippet.title: Curious Expedition - Console Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Curious Expedition is a roguelike expedition simulation set in the late 19th century, in which you will venture on unprecedented expeditions to regions never explored before. Now available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

A game by Maschinen-Mensch http://maschinen-mensch.com

Published by Thunderful https://www.thunderfulgames.com

We're also working on Curious Expedition 2, join the Closed Alpha at https://curious-expedition.com
